title: Adele hits back at trolls who said she looked like Princess Fiona from Shrek at the Grammys
text:
Adele hits back at trolls who said she looked like Princess Fiona from Shrek at the Grammys The Hello singer wore a green Givency dress to the music awards Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Adele has hit back at critics who claimed she looked like Princess Fiona from Shrek in her green Grammys dress. 
Despite winning five awards at the music ceremony, her happy night was ruined by cruel trolls who compared her to the cartoon ogre. 
Now the Hello singer has blasted those horrible people and explained she worked out twice a day to fit into the Givenchy gown. 
She said: “Before the Grammys I had this dress right, I wore this green dress, everyone said I looked like Fiona from Shrek.” Read More Adele has hit back at Twitter trolls (Photo: REUTERS) Fiona also wears a green dress (Photo: Dreamworks) 
“I don’t f**king care. It was Givenchy Couture, they can say what they want. 
“I worked out. Obviously I’m a large lady and I like eating food very much, but I was working out twice a day to fit into that Givenchy dress because it was quite tight.” 
Speaking at her gig in Perth, Australia, she added: “I was running a very long time to get fit for this but it never worked.” 
Adele’s green dress sparked a stream of harsh comments on social media comparing her to Fiona from Shrek. Read More Adele's family left 'disappointed' by claims she secretly married partner Simon Konecki in the US She won 5 awards though so whatevs (Photo: WireImage) 
The female lead in the Dreamworks franchise, voiced by Cameron Diaz, was dressed in a matching emerald gown. 
One Twitter user asked: “Why Adele look like Fiona from Shrek 1, 2, 3 and 4?” 
Another tweeted: “Somebody have to say : Adele as Fiona Shrek #GRAMMYs” 
A third troll added: “I’m not tryna be funny, I’m really not but is it just me or does Adele’s dress make her look like Fiona from Shrek?” Like us on Facebook
